name: check-ovo
title: Check Name OVO
description: Memeriksa dan mengambil nama pemilik akun OVO berdasarkan nomor telepon. Jika nama disensor XXXX, coba tanpa (0) nya. Langsung isi seperti 8954014XXX
curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/check-ovo \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"phone_number":"081234567890"}'
